trans-unit.source: Defines the delegate for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Define o delegado para o <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The RoleManagerEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O delegado de RoleManagerEventHandler está definido para o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>evento da <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application as shown in the example for this topic.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder a <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>eventos do <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>classe no ficheiro global. asax para a sua aplicação ASP.NET, conforme mostrado no exemplo para este tópico.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>

trans-unit.source: You can use the RoleManagerEventHandler to replace the creation of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> with your own custom object.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o RoleManagerEventHandler para substituir a criação do <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>objeto pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>com o seu próprio objeto personalizado.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: To do this, define a delegate using the RoleManagerEventHandler and assign it to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: Para tal, definir um delegado com o RoleManagerEventHandler e atribua-o para o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>evento de <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>
